messages.title: The choice for Stafford
messages.content: Last year was tough for many but now the economy is recovering our community has a great opportunity that we cannot risk: a choice we must make together.

messages.title: My Pledges to you
messages.content: More jobs, schools to give every child's life the best start, improve community and apprenticeships.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Schools to give every child's life the best start and improve community.
Hospital money to get some of the best in the country.
More green low-carbon jobs; more Green manufacturing jobs; more jobs at MOD Stafford.
Safeguard our successful Neighbourhood Policing Teams; safer streets free from fear.

issues.economy: The economy is recovering, offering a choice for investment and better public services.
issues.education: Schools to give every child's life the best start.
issues.environment: More green low-carbon jobs; more Green manufacturing jobs; more jobs at MOD Stafford.
issues.health: Hospital money to get some of the best in the country.

leaflet.personalStatement: This election offers a big choice about the change we want for our community, creating an age of aspiration or one of austerity.

contactInformation.address: David Kidney, FREEPOST NAT16631, Stafford, ST17 4BR at the Labour Rooms, Meyrick Road, Stafford.

socialMedia.twitter: Follow me on Twitter.com/davidkidney find me on Facebook and watch out for my Podcasts throughout the campaign!

quotes.text: This election offers a big choice about the change we want for our community, creating an age of aspiration or one of austerity. I'll fight to make sure we get a future fair for all.

images.caption: Re-Elect David Kidney - Putting you first
